Cardio.longDescription: Discover a quick and invigorating cardio session with our Cardio video. Lasting 15 minutes, this session is perfect for those tight on time yet eager to get their heart pumping. Whether you're a beginner or seasoned fitness enthusiast, choose this video when you need a burst of energy and a boost to your metabolism.
Cardio.title: Cardio

Cardio.longDescription: Elevate your fitness routine with our Cardio session. Lasting 30 minutes, this video offers a comprehensive cardiovascular workout suitable for all fitness levels. Select this video when you seek to enhance your endurance and burn calories effectively. Whether you're starting your day or winding down in the evening, this session promises a rewarding fitness experience.
Cardio.title: Cardio

Cardio.longDescription: Indulge in a comprehensive cardio workout with our 45-minute Cardio video. Suitable for all fitness levels, this session promises to elevate your heart rate and leave you feeling energized. Opt for this video when you're looking for a longer, more intense workout session to challenge yourself and improve your cardiovascular health.
Cardio.title: Cardio

Cardio.longDescription: Experience a fulfilling cardio session with our 60-minute Cardio video. Designed to provide a complete cardiovascular workout, this video caters to fitness enthusiasts seeking a longer and more challenging exercise routine. Choose this video to enhance your stamina and overall fitness level. Whether it's morning or evening, this session will help you achieve your fitness goals.
Cardio.title: Cardio

Yoga.longDescription:
Immerse yourself in a rejuvenating yoga session with our 15-minute Yoga

 video. Whether you're a beginner or experienced yogi, this session offers gentle yet effective poses to relax your mind and strengthen your body. Select this video when you need a brief escape from your hectic day or want to kickstart your morning with positivity and mindfulness.
Yoga.title: Yoga

Yoga.longDescription: Embark on a transformative yoga journey with our 30-minute Yoga video. Designed to cultivate balance and harmony in both body and mind, this session offers a series of flowing sequences suitable for all levels. Choose this video when you're seeking to release tension, improve flexibility, and reconnect with yourself. Whether it's your lunch break or evening wind-down, this session will leave you feeling refreshed and centered.
Yoga.title: Yoga

Yoga.longDescription: Dive deeper into your yoga practice with our 45-minute Yoga video. Explore a variety of poses and breathing techniques that promote strength, flexibility, and inner peace. Select this video when you're ready to challenge yourself and delve into the transformative power of yoga. Whether it's a sunny morning or peaceful evening, this session will leave you feeling grounded and revitalized.
Yoga.title: Yoga
